items.sentence: I don't want to be here when Tom gets home.
I don't know who those suitcases belong to.
Tom didn't seem to want to dance with Mary.
You have no right to ask me such questions.
Both of my sisters got married last spring.
Tom said he hoped that Mary would help him.
Tom is waiting for someone to come get him.
Is it true that Tom asked you to marry him?
You need to be careful when driving on ice.
I don't go to the gym as often as I should.
Tom ordered me to go home and I obeyed him.
Tom got off the train and ran towards Mary.
When do you have to go back to the dentist?
Are you going to get rid of all that stuff?
I'm very disappointed with the both of you.
It seems we're both very tired, doesn't it?
I thought that you went shopping yesterday.
It's a mystery how Tom escaped from prison.
Tom will need all the help that he can get.
Tom would never have allowed me to do that.
I can't believe that you used to work here.
It's possible that Tom won't be here today.
It looked like you were having a good time.
It looked like you were going to fall down.
There are many kinds of animals in the zoo.
This is the first time that I've been here.
Read over your paper before you hand it in.
Look both ways before you cross the street.
Tom doesn't have to do anything about that.
If I were you, I wouldn't worry about that.
You can make yourself heard even from here.
You should think before you begin to speak.
You should be more careful with your money.
You should know better now you're an adult.
You have plenty of time to catch the train.
The house standing on the hill is very old.
How long does it take to walk to City Hall?
That student sometimes pretends to be sick.
It's been three years since my father died.
There's not a malicious bone in Tom's body.
The journalist was kidnapped by terrorists.
I've always been passionate about football.
The joke that Tom told didn't go over well.
You can borrow my car whenever you want to.
Tom doesn't like doing that, but he has to.
Tom didn't seem at all surprised to see me.
Tom tipped the delivery boy thirty dollars.
I think Tom probably knows what's going on.
I wasn't aware that we were being recorded.
I just don't know how to make it up to you.
I don't know how many times I've done this.
I'm excited at the prospect of meeting Tom.
Tom told me that he wasn't sure what to do.
Nobody believed Tom would actually do that.
When Tom heard the news, he started crying.
I was pretty annoyed by what Tom was doing.
The only other person who has a key is Tom.
I know Tom isn't going to enjoy doing that.
I know Tom isn't a very good tennis player.
I know Tom is in his room changing clothes.
I know Tom is almost as tall as his father.
I know Tom is about the same age as we are.
I want you to know that I plan to be there.
I told you something that I shouldn't have.
I think that I'll be able to fix it myself.
I realize you don't really want to be here.
I know that you were in Boston last summer.
I know that Tom would never really do that.
I know that Tom will permit you to do that.
I know that Tom will be tempted to do that.
I know that Tom knows why I had to do that.
I know that Tom knows who did that for him.
I know that Tom knew that I should do that.
I know that Tom isn't afraid of Mary's dog.
I know that Tom isn't a very good wrestler.
I know that Tom isn't a university student.
I know that Tom isn't a member of our club.
I know that Tom isn't a good music teacher.
I know that Tom is a very talented painter.
I know that Tom is a very practical person.
I know that Tom is a lot younger than Mary.
I know that Tom is a lot smarter than I am.
I know that Tom is a good friend of Mary's.
I know that Tom is a bit shorter than Mary.
I know that Tom is a bit short for his age.
I know that Tom is a better driver than me.
I know that Tom doesn't want me to do that.
I know that Tom does that better than Mary.
I know Tom will want to do that by himself.
I know Tom will like doing that by himself.
I know Tom will have time to do that today.
Tom doesn't know that Mary doesn't like me.
Tom didn't know someone wanted to kill him.
Tom claims he can run faster than Mary can.
Tom can understand French better than Mary.
Tom ate the sandwich that Mary made for me.
Tom and Mary have both decided not to stay.
The police think that Tom was the arsonist.
The doctors assured Tom Mary would be fine.
Somebody told me Tom was allergic to wheat.
